why the version to set-strictmode is the same tthe version of powershell ? and what the difference between the versions ? it's not documented...for example: what restriction for version 7

why Downvote ?

comments.author: agowa338
comments.body:
I thought it was the same as PowerShell version to allow one to reference the latest coding guides that were available with a specific version of powershell, basically the same as with "-Requires", but for coding guides.

This however does not reflect the current state of how it is implemented as I had to learn after updating from Version 7 to 7.1 as it doesn't recognize 7.0 as valid anymore... (See #9206 for details about that)
